finalCountdownStart.label: Final Countdown Seconds
finalCountdownStart.tooltip: If the counter reaches this value, all new bits will reset the counter to this value. Example: When a user called a bid in the last 3 seconds, he will count again from 10 to let other the chance to bid.

defaultCountdown.label: Default Countdown Seconds
defaultCountdown.tooltip: When you activate the auction, at which countdown he should start to count by default? You can overwrite it a param behind the start command. Example: !startBid 500

minimumBidIncrease.label: Minimum Bid Increase
minimumBidIncrease.tooltip: What is the minum amount to bid? To prevent to outbit by one. Default is 200. Set to 0 to disable

commandBid.label: Bid Command
commandBid.tooltip: With this command users can bid

commandStartBid.label: Start Bid Command
commandStartBid.tooltip: With this command the Caster can start an auction. First argument parameter is the countdown in seconds. If empty, the default value will be used.

commandStopBid.label: Stop Bid Command
commandStopBid.tooltip: With this command the Caster can stop an auction
